about_the_game:
Just Life" is an immersive role-playing and life simulation game that revolves around storytelling and human connections. Step into the shoes of a young man fresh out of high school, whose path hasn't been easy due to financial constraints preventing him from attending college and a lack of work experience hindering his job prospects. However, a twist of fate presents an opportunity when he inherits an agricultural land. Embark on a journey to build success from scratch, starting with nothing. Your ultimate goal is to overcome challenges, forge meaningful relationships, and create a prosperous life for yourself in this captivating virtual world.









Exploration

Just Life features an expansive open world spanning 2 km² for you to explore. Immerse yourself in a small city bustling with a variety of shops, including clothing stores, accessories, tools, restaurants, cafes, bars, a museum, a library, parks, a school, banks, a shopping center, and countless other discoveries awaiting you. Venture further to discover a picturesque lake, majestic mountains, sprawling agricultural and industrial areas, abandoned mines, and even a prison. With so much to explore and endless possibilities, each day in Just Life will bring a unique experience.

Setting

The story unfolds in a captivating fictional city nestled in the southern hemisphere, embraced by majestic mountains and enriched by a tapestry of diverse cultures. The cityscape boasts a harmonious blend of architectural styles, mirroring its vibrant population. Isolated from the hustle and bustle of major urban centers, the quest for employment has become increasingly challenging, prompting many residents to seek greener pastures in bustling metropolises in pursuit of a better future. As the city ages gracefully, recent endeavors have been initiated to rejuvenate its spirit, such as the ongoing construction of a university and the influx of foreign companies, which brings both promises and potential pitfalls.

Detailed history

Just Life tells the story of an 18-year-old boy who has just graduated from high school. He lives alone with his mother and, due to economic reasons, cannot attend university despite being an excellent student. He decides to look for a job and help with the expenses at home, but luck is not on his side and after a month, he has not been able to find anything, as it is not easy to find employment without experience in his country.

One day, he receives a mysterious letter from a lawyer requesting that he come to her office. Somewhat hesitant and surprised by the request, he decides to attend. She informs him that his uncle, his father's brother, left him an agricultural land on the outskirts of the city as an inheritance. This could be good news for anyone, but not for him. His uncle's death affects him, and he sincerely wished he could have known him. The inheritance left him at a crossroads: what should he do with the land? He could sell it and attend university, but on the other hand, he felt that it was his uncle's last legacy and that it was not right to do so.

That night, after the appointment with the lawyer and after talking to his mother and deeply reflecting on it, he comes to the conclusion that he will not sell the inherited land. But what would he do? He was an inexperienced young man, without knowledge of agriculture and without money. Work the land? It was a crazy idea, but he still wanted to try. The world had not given him a job opportunity, so he decided that he would create his own. A huge challenge for one person, but he would not do it alone on this tough journey. He would meet new friends, form bonds, and even find love. The road to success will not be easy, with new challenges every day, but he has what it takes to succeed. The important thing is to never give up.

Characters

name: Just Life: A New Farmer's Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: In Just Life, inherit a farm and make strategic decisions to forge a successful life. Interact with characters and navigate the twists and turns of life in a captivating narrative. Experience the joys and challenges that come with building your own destiny.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
